name: Lucky Sky Defenders
description: This was a game created for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. Based on the theme of "Roll of the Dice", this is a shooter where you have to defend against enemies invading Earth. Each enemy taken out is a point gained. Every 5th enemy defeated gives you a random powerup, and you have to utilize that to your advantage. Obtain the highest score you can before the aliens get to Earth!
